name: Rob Rich
desc: A Trello board to manage the development of the Rob Rich website.

cards.name: Website Enhancements
tasks: Feature Planning: Brainstorm and list potential features to be added to the website.
Design Mockups: Create design mockups for new features using design tools (e.g., Figma).
User Feedback Integration: Collect feedback from users and integrate valuable suggestions.

cards.name: Content Updates
cards.desc: Schedule regular updates and new content.
tasks: Blog Posts: Plan and write blog posts (e.g., stories from gigs, new music releases, personal anecdotes).
Media Uploads: Schedule uploads for new videos, photos, and song releases.
Event Listings: Update upcoming and past show dates.

cards.name: SEO and Performance
tasks: Keyword Research: Conduct keyword research relevant to your music genre and target audience.
On-page SEO: Optimize website content for identified keywords.
Performance Optimization: Monitor site performance and implement necessary improvements.

cards.name: Technical Maintenance
cards.desc: Regular checks and updates to the website's backend.
tasks: Regular Updates: Schedule regular updates to the website's backend.
Security Checks: Perform security checks and updates.
Bug Fixes: Track and resolve any bugs or technical issues.

cards.name: Frontend Development
cards.desc: Develop the frontend components of the website.
tasks: Navbar and Footer Enhancements: Improve the design and functionality of the navbar and footer.
Show Dates Page: Implement a page to view upcoming and past show dates.
News Page: Create a page for news about Rob Rich.
About Page: Develop a page for information about the history of Rob Rich.
Music Page: Set up a page where users can hear songs, view lyrics, and watch videos.
Photo Gallery: Create a photo gallery page.
Fan Club Sign-up: Implement a sign-up form for the Rob Rich Fan Club.
Online Store: Develop an online store for merchandise.

cards.name: Backend Development
cards.desc: Develop the backend components of the website.
tasks: API Development: Develop APIs for handling user data, show dates, news updates, and fan club sign-ups.
Database Integration: Set up and integrate a database for storing user data, show dates, news, and merchandise inventory.
Authentication: Implement user authentication for fan club members and administrators.
